name: Intercorp Financial Services Inc.
description: Intercorp Financial Services Inc. (IFS) is a leading financial services holding company in Peru, dedicated to providing a comprehensive range of financial solutions to meet the diverse needs of its customers. Founded in 1988, IFS operates through various subsidiaries, including banks, insurance companies, and investment firms, establishing a strong presence in the Peruvian financial sector. The company aims to enhance the quality of life for its clients by offering services that include retail banking, corporate banking, asset management, and insurance products. IFS's flagship subsidiary, Interbank, is one of the largest private banks in Peru, known for its innovative approach and commitment to customer service. The bank provides a wide array of products such as personal loans, credit cards, mortgages, and investment solutions. Additionally, IFS is committed to sustainability and social responsibility, actively engaging in initiatives that contribute to the economic and social development of the communities it serves. The company's mission is to lead the transformation of the financial sector in Peru, leveraging technology and innovation to deliver superior services while fostering a strong corporate culture focused on integrity and excellence. With a diverse portfolio and a strong market position, Intercorp Financial Services continues to play a pivotal role in the growth and development of the Peruvian economy.
ceo: Gonzalo S. F. de la Fuente

key_executives.name: Gonzalo S. F. de la Fuente
Claudia J. O. de la Fuente

faq.answer: Intercorp Financial Services is headquartered in Lima, Peru.

faq.answer: Intercorp Financial Services was founded in 1988.
